purpose: Facilitate the interaction and management of AI-NFTs through a centralized core service.
principle: Built on TypeScript, leveraging AI models to enable NFT operations and interactions.
reusability: Modular architecture with API support for easy integration into NFT platforms and projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, potentially limited documentation and community support.
name: core
description: The core service to index, operate and interact with AI-NFT.
highlight: Provides a core service for interacting with AI-enhanced NFTs, allowing for indexing and operational capabilities.
